name: Crealogica
description: Crealogica is a computer services company specializing in web design, software programming, content maintenance, e-commerce applications, and all kinds of Internet projects of great technical complexity. They have a wide range of services ranging from design and web development, to other disciplines such as dedicated server management, hosting and domains, content management, search engine positioning, e-marketing campaigns, as well as the broadcasting of live video over the Internet.
